channel.title: National Neopian
channel.description:
National Neopian - Attached script.
This will play National Neopian for you. It works well, but on high lvls it mixes people up.
I just started it, so it's up to whoever cares to finish it. :D Enjoy!

item.title: National Neopian
item.dc:creator: @aznph8playa aznph8playa
item.description:
@aznph8playa wrote:

Nicely done. Just a few comments:

  1. It needs to recognize when the jail bars go down. It keeps pressing the keys which will make the macro detectable and loses some money as well. It shouldn’t be hard to stick in an extra requirement for the if statement checking for bars already there.

  2. You need to work something out with the colors. Like you said, I captured the small frog fellow but didn’t get the red techo (or whatever it’s called :p). The script also let the small green thief get through once or twice.

  • In case you haven’t already tried this, I suggest you try using another color on the body or checking for a false color on the door of the animal.
    -Maybe revamp the game to have set dimensions that checks each door individually? This would help with the recognition of the jail bars

Read full topic

item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

Slave Scyth:

Good Script, but it has a lot of errors, which you already seem to know. I will use this everyday, and I would love it if you could make it so that it beats that 1 red lizard guy also, and make it so that it jails the green shrimp person too. But, I used to get around 330 points at max, now I get 500 points at max. Thanks.

I just use my own fingers and hands to do it. It is very simple actually. I could make one but it’ll be quite hard. But i would still make a good one if you want.

Read full topic

item.title: National Neopian
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

gokon:

umm Ron, you forgot to make it press the keys, all it does currently is tell you that it found the things.

Gokon, this line: “SendKeys(Letters[Doors]);” sends the keys.

Sometimes it doesn’t work because the screen isn’t activated or the Flash game isn’t activated. Normally it’s the latter.

[quote=“Cydal Pk3r, post:6, topic:61962”]Found -1 at (142, 217).
Door: 2 | Sent: D
Total Monsters Jailed: 68[/quote]
That just means that it has found the color “-1” at (142, 217). So it then pressed the letter D which is Door 2. And according to that progress report, it has jailed a total of 68 monsters.

[quote=“sdcit, post:5, topic:61962”]Good job Ron.

  1. Ah… tolerance, Arkanor and I once discussed the possibility of Tolerance, and he said that the colorchange could be rather large… but, that was only for fuzzles from outer space, so I don’t know how this’ll work

  2. I once also tried to tackle the colorchange problem, and I tried getting the color of the door and seeing when it changed, but I think it failed because of either too much lag or the need to have a different procedure for each char.

  3. Anyways, good job, and I’ll give it a go.[/quote]
    Thanks for the comment sdcit. This script was a real pain lol. Stupid color changes. Thank you very much for the comment.

Eddie213:

can any1 finish this?

I wish someone would lol. If I find time, I’ll work on it.

teh dew:

Wow nice, I will dl it after and try. Thanks ron!

Hey no problem man. Actually I lied. It was a problem, but now I can say no problem meaning you’re welcome.

thefalz:

nice i might try it out soon

Thanks! Tell me what you think when you can.

~Ron

Read full topic

  2. I once also tried to tackle the colorchange problem, and I tried getting the color of the door and seeing when it changed, but I think it failed because of either too much lag or the need to have a different procedure for each char.

  3. Anyways, good job, and I’ll give it a go.
